dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint ComputerGuruToGo
dmca.body:
Notice of Infringement


David Cherry
5432 E. Holland Ave.
Fresno, Ca. 93727
Email: mail@computergurutogo.com
Phone: 559-270-6266

March 1, 2007


Dear Legal Support:

It has come to my attention that there is a website infringing on my copyrights. Could you please investigate this mater and if possible have the infringing website removed from your search results.

I have sent a Copyright Infringement Notice (Copy enclosed) to the owner of the infringing website with no results.


Documents enclosed:

Notice of Infringement (This page)

Infringement Notification for Web Search

Copyright Infringement Notice


Note: This is one of two websites that has infringed on my copyrights. I have sent you two letters; the other letter should arrive at the same time.


Thank you,
David Cherry


Infringement Notification for Web Search


1.Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed upon.
The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.computergurutogo.com


2.Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.
Search Query: leavycomputers
Infringing Web Page: http://www.leavycomputers.com


3.Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you.
David Cherry
5432 E. Holland Ave.
Fresno, Ca. 93727
Email: mail@computergurutogo.com
Phone: 559-270-6266


4.Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the allegedly infringing webpage.
Cell Phone: 087 79 85702
Phone: 041 68 56004
Email: info@leavycomputers.com


5.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.


6.I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

David Cherry	Date


Copyright Infringement Notice


Dear Sir:

It has come to my attention that you have made an unauthorized use of my copyrighted website entitled "computergurutogo.com". I have reserved all rights of this website, first published in 03/28/06.

Your website entitled "leavycomputers.com" (Home and About pages) is essentially identical to my website and is clearly an infringement of my copyright.

As you neither asked for nor received permission to use my website "computergurutogo.com" as the basis for your website "leavycomputers.com" you have willfully infringed my rights.

I demand that you immediately Cease and Desist the use and distribution of all infringing works derived from my website "computergurutogo.com", and destroy all copies immediately, and that you desist from this or any other infringements of my rights in the fixture. If you have not done so within 48 hours, I will have no choice but to pursue legal action against you.

This letter is not a warning or threat. It is being sent to you as part of a legal process that must be followed in an effort to maintain my legal rights. You can put an immediate stop to this process by removing the website "leavycomputers.com" (Home and About pages) within 48 hours.

Be advised that if the website is not removed within 48 hours, my next step will be to: Contact your web host (The Planet, formerly Everyones Internet) and suspend your hosting services.
Contact your domain name registrar (Lets Host) and have your domain name registration cancelled.
File a DMCA copyright infringement notice with the search engines such as Google, Yahoo, and Live Search (MSN) and have the website "leavycomputers.com" removed from their search results.

Note: Copies of the website "leavycomputers.com" (Home and About pages) have been made and may be used as evidence in this case.

Sincerely,
Computer Guru To Go
Date: 02/21/07


Infringement Notification for Web Search


1.Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed upon.
The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.computergurutogo.com


2.Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.
Search Query: remotetechservices
Infringing Web Page: http://www.remotetechservices.com


3.Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you.
David Cherry
5432 E. Holland Ave.
Fresno, Ca. 93727
Email: mail@computergurutogo.com
Phone: 559-270-6266


4.Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the allegedly infringing webpage.
Cesar Rodriguez
26951 La Alameda #1201
Mission Viejo, Ca 92691
Phone: 949-282-9632
Phone: 949-286-9632
Email: ctech@remotetechservices.com


5.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


David Cherry    Date

David Cherry
5432 E. Holland Ave.

Dear Legal Support:

It has come to my attention that there is a website infringing on my copyrights. Could you please investigate this mater and if possible have the infringing website removed from your search results.

I have sent a Copyright Infringement Notice (Copy enclosed) to the owner of the infringing website with no results.
